abstract.p: American General Hospitality Corp, Dallas, real estate investment trust, acquires 152-room Hilton Hotel in Durham, NC, for $12.1 million; Xerox Corp wins five-year contract worth more than $40 million to supply Ceridian Employer Services, unit of Ceridian Corp, with high-speed laser printing systems; American Home Patient Inc, Franklin, Tenn, acquires four home health care companies that have combined annual revenue of $5.6 million (S)

block.p: AMERICAN GENERAL HOSPITALITY CORP., Dallas, a real estate investment trust, said it had acquired a 152-room Hilton Hotel in Durham, N.C., for $12.1 million.

XEROX CORP., Stamford, Conn., said it had won a five-year contract worth more than $40 million to supply Ceridian Employer Services, a unit of Ceridian Corp., with high-speed laser printing systems for producing payroll checks, payroll-related reports and W-2 forms.
AMERICAN HOME PATIENT INC., Franklin, Tenn., a diversified home health care company, said it had acquired four home health care companies that have combined annual revenue of $5.6 million.
